name: Go Orbit
description:
Controls:

Click the Sun & Comet to start
Hold "W" to speed up the comet 
Hold "S" to slow down

Holding W will fill up the Speedbar and make you go hyperspeed & invincible!

Avoid the different enemies and try to survive for as long as you can.

Full Screen for the best experience!
This is my first game i uploaded to itch io so please tell me what you think!
